divs: Sighting Detailsit was June 12th 2012 around 10:45pm i was out for a walk and a smoke when i noticed that the star directly in the East sky looked to be growing in width and then began to pulsate with very noticeable lights rotating in a pattern i was in complete aww and watched its lights swirl around and around i began walking towards the east when i looked quickly around to see if any one can be a witness and no one was around i looked i looked back at the area that the ufo was and it was gone completely vanished with absolutely nothing for it to hide behind so i was upset that i turned away and didn't get to see it leave, i looked all around and then looked straight up to Ursa Major and saw a tiny star looked to be out of our atmosphere traveling slowly without lights blinking it kept a continuous whitish dim light glowing traveling from above me to the North and then 2 army jets side by side split apart and drifted away from each other both going to the east coming from the west looked as if they were searching then 2 more army jets further apart one came from northwest other from south west both did the opposite to the 1st set of jets as they came closer together as they traveled east i started feeling very dizzy and a little sick no jet went north as i don't think any one could have saw it traveling North unless they were looking from outer space so i started going back inside my home when i felt like i was going to be sick i got inside an puked in the bathroom it is now close to 4am i i can't shake the feeling that im being monitored and i just seen something go by my window weird!!!!
Object Shape: Circle, Cylinder, Diamond, Disc, Flash, Saturn-like, Sphere, Star-like, Triangle
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Oshawa
There were no other sightings in Oshawa on or around June 12th 2012
Summary: Ufo hovers then pulsates rotates and is gone with a blink of an eye chased by army
